content:
The old " winging it" approach! Sometimes, that's the best way to get things done, especially when it comes to rearranging furniture. You just need to trust your instincts and go with what feels right.

It's great that you had a clear goal in mind – creating more space and reducing clutter – and that you were able to achieve it. That sense of accomplishment can be very motivating, isn't it?

IKEA is a great choice for furniture, by the way! They have a wide range of affordable and stylish options, and their products are often designed with functionality in mind. It's perfect for people who want to get organized without breaking the bank.

So, now that you've got your books organized, do you find yourself enjoying your reading time more? Are there any particular books or authors that you're excited to dive into now that your collection is more accessible?

And, on a related note, have you considered using any book-related accessories, like bookmarks, booklights, or reading journals, to enhance your reading experience?
